snippet: Mr. Khan has had to cancel upcoming performances-as well as a run of "Sacred Monsters," with Sylvie Guillem, in France this week-due to an injured Achilles tendon.
abstract: Mr. Khan has had to cancel upcoming performances-as well as a run of "Sacred Monsters," with Sylvie Guillem, in France this week-due to an injured Achilles tendon.

headline.main: Akram Khan Cancels Show Due to Injury
headline.print_headline: Injured Akram Khan Cancels London Show
